creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: three long lines of text; shorter (horizontal?) line of text, LLQ; two tusk-shaped elements with radiating spirals at top and bottom; scalloped lines at top and bottom; cream paper fading at top and bottom to pink tone; seal, LLQ
text:
How amazing,
The sound of cicada wings—
Hanging lamp
title: How Amazing
